appetizers.name: Lemon Coriander Shrimp
appetizers.description: Shrimps tossed with fresh coriander, lemon juice and light spices.

entrees.name: Methi Malai Paneer
entrees.description: Cubes of paneer cooked in a sauce made with a touch of fenugreek (a spices like basil) cream and cashews.

entrees.name: Shahi Murg Kadahi
entrees.description: Chicken cubes cooked in a rich blend of aromatic spices and almond paste.

entrees.name: Gosht Kali Mirch
entrees.description: Lamb cubes, curry leaves, onions, ground pepper and a special blend of spices.

entrees.name: Salmon Saag
entrees.description: Salmon kabobs cooked in lightly spiced spinach.
